title: Kaitlyn Bristowe On Her Engagement, Babies and the Upcoming Season of ‘The Bachelorette’
description:
Former “Bachelorette” Kaitlyn Bristowe joins Becca and guest co-host Catherine Lowe to share all the details about her engagement to Jason Tartick. Kaitlyn reveals when they plan to tie the knot and why babies are top of mind. 

Plus, Kaitlyn was there for all the drama on this season of “The Bachelorette,” and now she’s sharing some behind-the-scenes details on Katie’s search for love. Kaitlyn also explains why she wishes she’d had a former Bachelorette helping her during her time as the lead. 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:
